messages.content:
You are an expert in interactive web design and front-end pedagogy. Please design a high-quality interactive HTML page that provides an in-depth, hands-on exploration of Binary Search Tree (BST).
Only return HTML code!

fsm.description: Finite state machine for an interactive binary search tree exploration application.
fsm.notes: The FSM captures the states of inserting, searching, and deleting nodes in a binary search tree, along with handling invalid inputs.

messages.content:
You are an expert in interactive web design and front-end pedagogy. Please design a high-quality interactive HTML page that provides an in-depth, hands-on exploration of K-Nearest Neighbors (KNN).
Only return HTML code!

fsm.description: Finite state machine for K-Nearest Neighbors (KNN) exploration application.
fsm.notes: The application starts in the 'idle' state and transitions to 'updating' when the update button is clicked. After the plot is drawn, it transitions back to 'idle'.

messages.content:
You are an expert in interactive web design and front-end pedagogy. Please design a high-quality interactive HTML page that provides an in-depth, hands-on exploration of Bubble Sort.
Only return HTML code!

fsm.description: Finite State Machine for Bubble Sort Visualization application.
fsm.notes: The FSM captures states for generating a new array, sorting, and completion of sorting.

messages.content:
You are an expert in interactive web design and front-end pedagogy. Please design a high-quality interactive HTML page that provides an in-depth, hands-on exploration of Queue.
Only return HTML code!

fsm.description: Finite state machine for an interactive queue exploration tool that allows users to enqueue and dequeue items.
fsm.notes: The 'updating' state is entered when either enqueue or dequeue actions are performed, and it transitions back to 'idle' after the queue display is updated.

messages.content:
You are an expert in interactive web design and front-end pedagogy. Please design a high-quality interactive HTML page that provides an in-depth, hands-on exploration of Stack.
Only return HTML code!

fsm.description: Finite state machine for an interactive stack exploration application.
fsm.notes: The FSM captures the states of the stack operations and user interactions.

messages.content:
You are an expert in interactive web design and front-end pedagogy. Please design a high-quality interactive HTML page that provides an in-depth, hands-on exploration of Binary Search Tree (BST).
Only return HTML code!

fsm.description: Finite state machine for an interactive binary search tree exploration application.
fsm.notes: The application transitions between idle, inserting, and removing states based on user interactions with the buttons.

messages.content:
You are an expert in interactive web design and front-end pedagogy. Please design a high-quality interactive HTML page that provides an in-depth, hands-on exploration of Linked List.
Only return HTML code!

fsm.description: Finite state machine for an interactive linked list exploration application.
fsm.notes: The FSM captures the main interactive states of the linked list application, including adding, removing, and traversing nodes.

messages.content:
You are an expert in interactive web design and front-end pedagogy. Please design a high-quality interactive HTML page that provides an in-depth, hands-on exploration of Heap (Min/Max).
Only return HTML code!

fsm.description: Finite state machine for an interactive heap exploration application.
fsm.notes: The 'inserting' state is triggered after a value is inserted into the heap, and the 'deleting' state is triggered after the root is deleted.
